org.jamwiki.parser.image

Class ImageMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.parser.image.ImageMetadata

  • public class ImageMetadata
extends Object
    Utility method used to model image metadata including alignment, max dimension, etc.

      boolean getAllowEnlarge()
      Return a flag indicating whether the image can be resized larger than its actual dimensions.

        public int getGalleryHeight()
        Gallery height is used for adding padding around image gallery images. Specify the total vertical space available for display, in pixels.

        Gallery height is used for adding padding around image gallery images. Specify the total vertical space available for display, in pixels.

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle()
        Return the HTML title tag to use with the link surrounding the image tag. This value will not have been escaped so the link builder will need to escape it.

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(String title)
        Return the HTML title tag to use with the link surrounding the image tag. This value will not have been escaped so the link builder will need to escape it.
